rules_text:
When In Corpore Sano enters the battlefield, you take imperium. [i](Creatures you cast enter the battlefield with an extra +1/+1 counter. You lose imperium at the end of your turn if you didn’t attack or cast a creature spell.)[/i]
If one or more +1/+1 counters would be put on a creature you control, that many plus one +1/+1 counters are put on it instead.
